Style/RedundantArgument.description:
Description

Checks for a redundant argument passed to certain methods.
Style/RedundantArgument.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Methods: {'join': '', 'sum': 0, 'exit': True, 'exit!': False, 'to_i': 10, 'split': ' ', 'chomp': '\n', 'chomp!': '\n'} (type: dict)
